title: ScaleAl lays off an entire team; then invites employees to..
description: Scale AI has disbanded its Dallas-based New Projects Organization, a team of contractors focused on general AI chatbot improvement. This move, following a significant Meta investment, signals an industry pivot towards specialized, expert-level AI training in fields like medicine and robotics.  Affected workers received severance and were offered opportunities on Scale's gig platform.

title: Hyderabad scandal: Landlord held for installing hidden camera in woman’s washroom
description: A 23-year-old woman in Hyderabad discovered a hidden camera in her rented flat's washroom, allegedly installed by her landlord and an electrician. Police registered a case and arrested the landlord after the woman reported the incident. The electrician is currently absconding.

As devotees pray to Lord Kuber and Goddess Laxmi, they adhere to specific timings for rituals and shopping to attract blessings.
